Most sorcerers are born with powerful magical abilities that allow them to cast spells. You might have had your powers awakened later, but your powers are part of you whether you like it or not. You use &reference[charisma] as your @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.sxKTtNPUrcDvMDFj.JournalEntryPage.arD4KLvgCPbi1Pl7]{spellcasting ability}for sorcerer spells, since you draw upon your force of personality to shape the magical forces that empower you.

Sorcerers are &reference[knownspells]{known spellcasters}. The @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-class.Item.emEIZZAh0s8Ed62c]{Sorcerer Progression Table} shows how many spell slots you have, as well as how many cantrips and spells you know. You can search the @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.vaLYevRxKe8mAvdE.JournalEntryPage.AhDBGnMKm7VqbOzs]{list of sorcerer spells here}.

Spellcasting Focuses

You can use an arcane focus or component pouch as a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.sxKTtNPUrcDvMDFj.JournalEntryPage.R25K8TvAPK3c4ywr]{spellcasting focus}for casting sorcerer spells.
